chunk_1.title: COMPOSITION
chunk_1.details: Boxy fit sweatshirt made of cotton fabric with a napped interior. Featuring a hood, long sleeves, contrast patch appliquÃ© on the back and ribbed trims. We work with monitoring programmes to ensure compliance with our social, environmental and health and safety standards for our products. To assess compliance, we have developed a programme of audits and continuous improvement plans.

chunk_2.title: CERTIFIED MATERIALS
chunk_2.details: Nowadays, recycled polyester is mainly made from PET plastic waste. This is a type of plastic that is widely used in a variety of items, such as plastic bottles. Using recycled materials helps limit the production of virgin polyester fibre. It is certified to the Recycled Claim Standard (RCS), which verifies the recycled content and tracks it from source to final product.

item_1.review: Absolutely love this sweatshirt! Super comfy and the boxy fit is perfect. Looks great with jeans or joggers!

item_2.review: Great for casual days! Love the relaxed fit, though I wish it was a bit softer. Still, awesome look!

item_3.review: Really cool design and the patches make it stand out. Itâ€™s a bit oversized, but thatâ€™s the vibe I wanted!

item_4.review: Itâ€™s nice, but the boxy fit was a bit too wide for me. Love the style though â€“ would size down next time.
